title: Aurora Packing Company, Inc. Recalls Beef Products Due to Possible E. coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, May 22, 2019 Aurora Packing Company, Inc., a North Aurora, Ill. establishment, is recalling approximately 62,112 pounds of raw beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.
